name: NekoNova's Not Home
description:
You emerge from a supernova formed in the center of this strange new universe…

The Black hole formed by the Supernova is starting to rip and tear this universe to shreds! Jump from geometry to geometry in order to survive as long as possible before inevitably being sucked back into the black hole!

Act fast, but make sure not to collide with any unstable red shapes. Aim for the stable blue shapes!

Created for Ludum Dare 49: Unstable

Instructions & Controls

Left Click to shoot your ship in the direction of your mouse. You only have 1 shot! But you can replenish that shot by possessing blue objects!

Collide with geometry to launch yourself and continue to orbit around the black hole! Each time you jump out of geometry your score increases, the more geometry you collide with before you get sucked into the black hole the higher your score!

Blue Stable Geometry you can jump off of!

Red Unstable Geometry launches you immediately in a random direction! Unstable geometry do not increase your score, so make sure to avoid them at all costs.

At the end of the game when you are sucked back into the black hole your score will be displayed. Feel free to post and share your top scores in the comments!

Features
  • Orbit around the black hole for a wild gravitational ride!
  • Jump between more than 5 distinct shapes!
  • Play as many different colored cats each time you play!
  • Avoid unstable geometry in order to keep control and avoid orbiting constantly around the black hole!
